subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Indiana Pacers traded forward Shawne Williams to the Dallas Mavericks for the 14-year veteran Eddie Jones, future draft picks and cash. Larry Bird, the Pacers’ president, has made it clear that he plans to repair the team’s image after several off-the-court problems in recent years. Williams, Indiana’s first-round draft pick in 2006, was dogged by three incidents involving the police in the past 13 months.
